a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: Governor closes schools for remainder of 2019-2020 school year

div.p: Washington Governor Jay Inslee announced on April 6, 2020 that schools across the state will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year in order to slow the spread of COVID-19, the coronavirus. Teachers and school staff are providing students with updated in-home learning materials posted on each school's website every Friday.
Other resources are available for families during this closure (additional learning materials, meals, childcare, more) are placed on our Students & Families page.
